text: Sila Srikampang (, born April 18, 1989), is a Thai professional footballer who plays as a Right back for Thai League 1 club Sukhothai and the Thailand national team. ==Personal life== Sila's brother Adisak Srikampang is also a footballer and plays as a Forward. ==International career== In June 2015, Sila debuted for Thailand against Bahrain in a friendly match. ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: Sila Srikampang
